name: deal breaker
desc:
Steal a complete set of properties from any player.
(include any buildings.)

name: double the rent!
desc:
Needs to be played
with a rent card.

name: fored deal
desc:
Swap any property
with another player
(Cannot be part of a full set.)

name: house
desc:
Add onto any full set you own to add M3m to the rent value
(Except railroads and utilities)

name: hotel
desc:
Add onto any full set you own to add M4m to the rent value
(Except railroads and utilities)

name: it's my birthday
desc: All player give you M2m as a "gift".

name: just say no!
desc: Use any time when an action card is played against you.

name: sly deal
desc:
Steal a property from the player of your choice.
(Cannot be part of a full set.)
